<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75427</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>74969d8d-c8f0-4303-82af-63b9dbb5e095#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Erdélyi lovaspuskás (1650)</string>
            <string language="en">Transylvanian horseman with a gun (1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transylvanian Reiter mit einer Gewehr (1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavalier de Transylvanian avec un pistolet 
(1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horseman de Transylvanian com um injetor (1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Horseman di Transylvanian con una pistola (1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιππέας Transylvanian με ένα πυροβόλο όπλο (1650)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jinete de Transylvanian con un arma (1650)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Tollas süvegű piros ruhás lovas</string>
            <string language="en">Horseman dressed in red and wearing a feathered high cap</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">lovas puskás csontberakás három toll,  </string>
            <string language="en">horseman rifleman bone-marquetry three feathers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reiter kleidete im Rot und im Tragen einer mit 
Federn versehenen hohen Schutzkappe an</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cavalier s'est habillé le rouge et en portant
un haut chapeau fait varier le pas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O horseman vestiu-se no vermelho e em desgastar um
tampão elevado feathered</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il horseman si è vestito nel colore rosso e 
nell'uso di alta protezione messa le piume a</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ιππέας έντυσε σε κόκκινο και φθορά μιας επενδυμένης
με φτερά υψηλής ΚΑΠ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El jinete vistió en rojo y desgastar un casquillo
alto emplumado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Federn des Reiter Rifleman Knochen-Bone-marquetry drei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plumes du rifleman bone-marqueterie trois de cavalier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">penas do osso-bone-marquetry três do rifleman do 
horseman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piume del osso-bone-marquetry tre del rifleman del 
horseman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κόκκαλο-μαρquετρυ τουφεκιοφόρων ιππέων τρία φτερά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plumas del hueso-bone-marquetry tres del rifleman del 
jinete</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
